_xResult.title: Army Green Cotton Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Asymmetrical maxi skirt with long straps and sweater sleeve detailing
_xResult.longdesc:
You definitely won't find any "outfit twins" in this one-of-a-kind army green maxi skirt. Maintaining femininity with it long, elegant structure, but adding edge with its army overtones, this skirt is truly a unique blend.

 

The sweatshirt sleeves, white buttons, and hanging straps layer on detailing and texture to this neutral skirt that we are digging! Pair it with a similar army green cotton blouse, or with something white or cream to really stand out. This skirt is perfect for spring and fall! 

 

For custom requests or questions about this piece, reach out to Teyxo using the contact button below!
